sourcesContent:
System Settings

Configure AI parameters, thresholds, and notifications

Crowd Density Thresholds

Define safe crowd threshold values to prevent false positives caused by sudden movements.

Triggers an 'Elevated' status alert.

Triggers an immediate Emergency Protocol warning.

1 min {{ settings.thresholds.sustainedTime }} mins 15 mins

Time density must remain high before triggering an alert.

AI Processing Parameters

Manage how the computer vision model detects people in highly dense environments.

Lower (More False Positives) {{ settings.aiModel.detectionConfidence }}% Higher (May miss obscured individuals)

Helps manage real-time processing limitations on hardware.

Communication Preferences
